content: snugly around back * repeat until cord measures 8 10 12 14 inches cut yarn thread tail through remaining sts leave loose ends to use when sewing i-cord to hat body and attaching pompoms make 2 pompoms in cc tie one to the end of each i cord with the yarn tail knot securely and trim assembly steam block following pieces 1 x hat body 2 x outer ears 2 x inner ears attach ears on each mc inner ear sew in ends leave ends loose on cc ends these will be used to sew inner and outer ears together and sew ears to hat body 1 layer one inner ear on one outer ear ws together 2 seam around sides and top with cc whipstitch 3 add a small bit of stuffing a slim cotton ball s worth to the top of each assembled ear 4 with cc sides up use whip stitch to sew ears to sides of hat on each side 2-3 inches from top of hat so they flop down the sides attach i-cords with brim turned up sew one i-cord to each side of hat on the inside securing it about ⅓ of the way up the ribbed brim and at the bottom edge catching the brim from the inside so stabilize it in turned up position steam block once more to finish wear in love of your neighbor and resistance to fascism this pattern is offered free for personal use and for small scale handknit makers with a suggested free-will donation to organizations efforts and crowdfunding opportunities through stand with minnesota please credit beso beso handmade as the designer and tag @besobesohandmade when sharing on social media page 3 copyright beso beso handmade 2026 abbreviations co cast on bobble bind off k knit p purl kfb knit into front and back of stitch k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip slip knit both slipped stitches slipped as if to knit st s stitch es rs right side ws wrong side pm place marker sm slip marker page 4 copyright beso beso handmade 2026
